BESA.Kernel.Agent

Class PortBESA

  • java.lang.Object
    • BESA.Kernel.Agent.PortBESA

  • public class PortBESA
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a port BESA, which makes treatment of behaviors, guards and events.
    Since:
    JDK1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PortBESA(GuardBESA guard)
      Creates a new instance of PortBESA associated to a guard.
